Text.Page:
The orcans and the kumases made reaching the Sanctum Mysterium very tricky. Their supply shipment comes from us and, as you know, we just got ours.

I'll put together what we can spare for them but it'll be a few days.

Can you talk to {@LinkCreature:207#1001#Mattin} at the Sanctum Mysterium? Let him know we've not forgotten.

Supplies and good news are in rather short supply. Heroth's situation is unenviable but ours may rapidly become untenable.

Your message is noted. Good day.
